name: mail-in-a-box
description: Mail-in-a-Box API HTTP specification.  # Introduction This API is documented in [**OpenAPI format**](http://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.3). ([View the full HTTP specification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mail-in-a-box/mailinabox/api-spec/api/mailinabox.yml).)  All endpoints are relative to `https://{host}/admin` and are secured with [`Basic Access` authentication](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_access_authentication). If you have multi-factor authentication enabled, authentication with a `user:password` combination will fail unless a valid OTP is supplied via the `x-auth-token` header. Authentication via a `user:user_key` pair is possible without the header being present.
